title: Penfold Wine typeface
content:
Anyone know some good ones that are close. This is for logo development. Thanks Typophiler's!

-d

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417200319im_/http:/typophile.com/files/89692d_3615.jpg)
author: dwf29

comments.content: [Letterhead Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417200319/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/styles/script.php) has a few that might be a good starting point.
The text font is some kind of Baskerville JFTR.
